description: This dashboard is used to display data for the plants. The plant to observe can be set in a textfield

targets.query:
from(bucket: "iot-data")
  |> range(start: -1m) // Query the last 5 minutes to keep it efficient
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "plant_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.plant_name == "${selected_plant}")
  |> last() // Select only the most recent value

from(bucket: "iot-data")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "plant_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temperature") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.plant_name == "${selected_plant}")

from(bucket: "iot-data")
  |> range(start: -1m) // Query the last minute to keep it efficient
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "plant_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ground_moisture")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.plant_name == "${selected_plant}")
  |> last() // Select only the most recent value

from(bucket: "iot-data")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "plant_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ground_moisture") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.plant_name == "${selected_plant}")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "iot-data")
  |> range(start: -1y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "optimal_conditions") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.plant_name == "${selected_plant}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "optimal_temp_min")
  |> last()
list.label: Optimal min temp
list.name: optimal_temp_min
